name: jira_add_comment
description: Add a comment to a Jira issue.

steps.code: const baseUrl = `{{jira_url}}`.replace(/\/$/, ''); const body = { body: { type: 'doc', version: 1, content: [{ type: 'paragraph', content: [{ type: 'text', text: `{{comment}}` }] }] } }; const resp = await fetch(baseUrl + '/rest/api/3/issue/{{issue_key}}/comment', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, credentials: 'same-origin', body: JSON.stringify(body) }); if (!resp.ok) { const err = await resp.text(); throw new Error('Comment failed: ' + resp.status + ' ' + err); } const result = await resp.json(); return { success: true, key: '{{issue_key}}', comment_id: result.id, author: result.author?.displayName || '' }
steps.name: result
steps.label: Add comment via REST API
